TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: Who wants to do a Laythe mission to send a peace appeal to Chobit?

Who wants to do a Laythe mission to send a peace appeal to Chobit?

Peace? *vomits* We have a giant orbital laser cannon, the Excalibur I. Prepare to fire it at her fleet in Laythe orbit!

Peace? *vomits* We have a giant orbital laser cannon, the Excalibur I. Prepare to fire it at her fleet in Laythe orbit!

Too late. The United Terran Planets, has fired their own ion cannon. Laythe nolonger exists. Humans are now in the fight.
I can NOT wait til Chobit reads this. I'm trying to imagine her response and dying laughing at that. What happens'll be soo much funnier!
HER SERVANT HAS COME! Run!

HER SERVANT HAS COME! Run!

She doesn't seem to be trying to attack us. Any other Chobit bases to be destroyed?

HER SERVANT HAS COME! Run!

QUICK! CAPTURE HER AND MAKE CHOBIT PAY RANSOM MONEY! It is a flawless plan!

QUICK! CAPTURE HER AND MAKE CHOBIT PAY RANSOM MONEY! It is a flawless plan!

Um, okay. Scrap leaving here alone. GET OUT THE BAGS

As much as I love the Yamato, it pales in comparison to the wackiness I've invented before. If I really wanted to get into a faux-fleet fight with you people, you would be easily outnumbered and probably outgunned. And I don't even use death lasers that cook whole planets, only conventional weaponry

Peace? I never agreed to a war in the first place, your bloodlust disgusts me, and that's coming from someone who can trace their military lineage all the way back to when tricorne hats were still in fashion

Capturing Trekkette? Nice work, she can handle herself.

More of my bases to destroy? What makes you think you've hit them to begin with.
Wait... I'm Chobit's servant? How'd that happen? And why am I being held for ransom! I was just sitting here eating popcorn!

*activates the Excalibur I* I will end this madness by destroying THE SOLAR SYSTEM! *shoots at the sun, causing it to explode. My Ark spaceships transport seals and human members of the Seal Army to the Andromeda Galaxy, so Chobit can't find us*
You know, redwolfy is the one who started this. This is what she posted.

1. you can't blow up the sun by shooting it.

2. I'll deal with wolfy in my own time...

1. you can't blow up the sun by shooting it.

2. I'll deal with wolfy in my own time...

The laser had A LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT of power. It actually shoots red matter.

Wait... I'm Chobit's servant? How'd that happen? And why am I being held for ransom! I was just sitting here eating popcorn!

Welcome to Fate / word salad title! Where people compete for a horrendous supernatural abomination, and the points don't matter!
*the Ark ships arrive at an ice planet, which is named Polaris. The seals and humans start settling there.*

As much as I love the Yamato, it pales in comparison to the wackiness I've invented before. If I really wanted to get into a faux-fleet fight with you people, you would be easily outnumbered and probably outgunned. And I don't even use death lasers that cook whole planets, only conventional weaponry

Peace? I never agreed to a war in the first place, your bloodlust disgusts me, and that's coming from someone who can trace their military lineage all the way back to when tricorne hats were still in fashion

Capturing Trekkette? Nice work, she can handle herself.

More of my bases to destroy? What makes you think you've hit them to begin with.

One second, I'm calling in the fleets of the Type V's. Awww yeah.
Seal and human cities are being constructed on Polaris. Everything is doing very well.

...what on earth did I just walk into?

For a random thread things got REALLY random.

Seal and human cities are being constructed on Polaris. Everything is doing very well.

??? How are humans there? Were'nt they one of Type V's I called in?

??? How are humans there? Were'nt they one of Type V's I called in?

The humans I brought to Polaris were only Seal Army members. The Seal Army is only a Type II.

Made a thread for the progress on Polaris.

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29915-Polaris-A-Seal-Army-Planet

The laser had A LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOT of power. It actually shoots red matter.
REBOOT STAR TREK REFERENCE FTW!

Darn tootin' I can take care of myself. Although precise explanations of how are likely to get me in BIG trouble... Think Sharon Stone in Basic Instinct...

Welcome to Fate / word salad title! Where people compete for a horrendous supernatural abomination, and the points don't matter!

My favourite one is "The points are completely useless! Just like condoms to a Trekkie! Completely useless"

Just like condoms to a Trekkie! Completely useless

Excuse me while I gag on this cider while laughing.

Yadda yadda, my space fleet is bigger

Hey Trekkette, should I bring some of Ozma's ships into this?
